text.div:
NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
IMMZDUpdateVaccinationRecord 0..*BaseIMMZ.D Update Vaccination Record
Instances of this logical model can be the target of a Reference
immunizatioEventStatus 1..1codeThe current status of the individual immunization event
Binding: IMMZ.D1.DE1 CodeSystem for Immunization status (required)
reasonNotDone 0..1codeReason vaccine was not administered
Binding: IMMZ.D1.DE5 CodeSystem for Reason Not Done (required)
vaccineProduct 1..1CodingVaccine brand
liveVaccine 0..1booleanLive attenuated vaccine
vaccineType 0..1CodingVaccine type
dateTime 1..1dateTimeDate and time of vaccination
countryOfVaccination 1..1CodingCountry of vaccination
Binding: Country ValueSet (required)
vaccinationLocation 0..1stringVaccination location
vaccineManufacturer 0..1stringVaccine manufacturer
vaccineLotNumber 0..1stringVaccine batch number
vaccineMAH 0..1stringVaccine market authorization holder
vaccineExpirationDate 0..1stringExpiration date
vaccineDoseQuantity 0..1stringDose quantity
healthWorker 0..1stringHealth worker identifier
vaccineDoseNumber 0..1integerDose number
vaccineTotalDosesInSeries 0..1integerTotal doses in series

Documentation for this format

name: IMMZDUpdateVaccinationRecord
title: IMMZ.D Update Vaccination Record
description: Data elements for IMMZ.D Update Vaccination Record.

element.definition: Data elements for IMMZ.D Update Vaccination Record.

element.short: The current status of the individual immunization event
element.definition: The current status of the individual immunization event
The reason this immunization event was not performed
The brand or trade name used to refer to the vaccine received
Uses a living but weakened version of the virus or one that's very similar
Vaccine type/category that was administered or was to be administered. Any vaccine code available in the IMMZ.Z Vaccine Library list of codes applies in this data element
Represents the visit/encounter date, which is the date and time when the vaccine was administered to the client
The service delivery country where the vaccine administration occurred
The service delivery location where the vaccine administration occurred
The manufacturer of the vaccine product
Batch number or lot number of vaccine
Name of the market authorization holder of the vaccine received. If market authorization holder is unknown, vaccine manufacturer is REQUIRED
The expiration date of the vaccine
The quantity of vaccine product that was administered

The person, organization, or role of the entity that performed the act of giving the vaccine to the client. The implementing system can choose to populate this field using data from a health worker registry or health facility registry
Vaccine dose number including dose number within series
The recommended number of doses for immunity according to the national protocol
